message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay $1200000 for it. This is the maximum amount I am comfortable spending. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position. While $1200000 is the minimum I'm willing to accept, I'm prepared to make a slight concession. I'm willing to sell the product for $1300000. This allows for a reasonable profit for me and still represents a good deal for you. Please consider this offer carefully.
